name: DEPART – Deposit and Part payment for Woo
author: VillaTheme

sections.description:
DEPART – Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce helps you streamline your payment processes, enabling flexible deposit and part payment options for your WooCommerce store. This plugin allows you to accept deposits, set up customizable payment plans, and automate payment processing, significantly enhancing your store’s functionality.

With DEPART, you can boost sales, reduce cart abandonment, and improve customer satisfaction by offering flexible payment solutions tailored to your customers’ needs.

A deposit and part payment for WooCommerce solution can offer numerous benefits to your WooCommerce store, enhancing both the customer experience and your business operations.

For retailers, offering split payment options boosts sales conversion rates and reduces cart abandonment by lowering purchase barriers for high-value products. This enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty while mitigating risks associated with non-payment by securing an initial deposit.

As for customers, split payments improve financial management and increase purchasing power, allowing them to afford high-value items without budget strain. This flexibility also opens opportunities for negotiation and beneficial agreements, enhancing their shopping experience.

And that’s why you need a solution for deposit and part payment for WooCommerce. And DEPART – Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce can definitely help you with:

  • Boost Sales and Enhance Customer Experience: DEPART is designed to address your concerns with deposits and part payments, helping you manage these tasks efficiently and effectively.
  • Simplify Management:: DEPART streamlines the payment process with features like automatic payment processing through popular gateways like Stripe, and automatic reminders and notifications, making it easier to manage transactions so you can focus on running your business.
  • Easy Setup and Customization: The plugin is straightforward to set up and customize. Whether applying global deposit rules or creating unique payment plans for specific products, DEPART offers user-friendly options and settings.
  • Reliable Support: DEPART includes reliable customer support to assist with any questions or issues, ensuring you get the most out of the plugin and receive help whenever needed.
    Let’s take a deeper look at how DEPART – Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce can meet your needs in a solution of deposit and part payment for WooCommerce.

Documents | Facebook group

Features of Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce

  • Accept Deposits on Products: Allow customers to make an initial deposit and pay the balance later, providing them with financial flexibility.
  • Flexible Payment Plans: Set up customized payment schedules, allowing customers to choose the frequency and duration of their installment payments.
  • Deposit Rules: Offer payment plans to specific users and products by setting up deposit rules.
  • Product-Level Custom Payment Plans: Add exclusive payment plans for individual products.
  • Automatic Payment Processing: Automate the installment payment process with popular payment gateways like Stripe.
  • Reminders and Notifications: Send reminders and notifications to customers about upcoming installment payments.
  • Exclude Specific Payment Gateways: Disable specific payment gateways when a deposit is in the cart.
  • Compatibility: Works seamlessly with WooCommerce; WooCommerce Email Template Customizer for email template customization; and the WooCommerce Stripe Gateway for payment method and automated payment process.

Incorporating a deposit and part payment for WooCommerce solution not only addresses these critical needs but also positions your business as customer-centric and financially savvy. DEPART‘s flexible payment plans and comprehensive features make it an essential tool for enhancing both customer experience and business performance.

Details Features of DEPART – Deposit and Part payment for WooCommerce

Accept Deposits on Products: DEPART – Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce allows you to accept deposits on any product in your WooCommerce store, giving customers the flexibility to pay with or without a fixed schedule. This means they can choose to pay at their convenience, enhancing their shopping experience and making high-value products more accessible.

Payment Plans: A payment plan is a structured arrangement where the remaining balance of a product’s price is divided into multiple installments. These installments are made over a specified period, allowing customers to spread the cost of the product over time. Basically, a payment plan outlines the subsequent payments to complete the purchase.
1. Build Unlimited Payment Plans: Create as many payment plans as you need to suit different products and customer preferences. There’s no limit to the number of plans you can establish, offering maximum flexibility.
2. Settings for each Installment Plan: Design payment plans with multiple installments. Each installment can have its own:
– Payment amount, calculated as a percentage of the total product price.
– Payment interval for each installment in days, months, or years (excluding the initial payment, which is required at the time of purchase).
– Fee to each installment, calculated as a percentage of the installment amount.
3. Enable/Disable Plans: Activate or deactivate any payment rules as needed, allowing you to easily manage and adjust payment options based on current business requirements.

Deposit Rules: Defines how deposit payments are applied to products. It specifies conditions such as which products, categories, or user roles are eligible for deposits.
1. Global Rules
– Create Unlimited Rules: Establish as many global deposit rules as you need, with no restrictions on the number of rules.
– Activate/Deactivate Rules: Turn rules on or off according to your needs.
– Set Up Conditions: Define conditions for applying rules, including price range, inclusion or exclusion of categories, products, and user roles.
– Select Payment Plans: Assign any payment plans to the rule to determine how deposits and installments are handled.
2. Custom Rules
– Configure Per Product: Set up custom deposit rules directly on the product editing page. These rules apply specifically to individual products.
– Highest Priority: Custom rules override global rules if conditions are met, ensuring that specific product needs are addressed.

Automatic Payment
1. Automated Installment Payments: Automatically process installment payments for deposit orders using specified payment methods. This feature eliminates the need for customers to manually complete each installment, streamlining the payment process.
2. Integration with Popular Payment Methods: DEPART works seamlessly with popular payment methods, including Stripe, to ensure efficient and reliable payment processing.
3. Exclude Specific Payment Methods: Select specific payment methods to be disabled if a deposit is present in the cart. This ensures that only compatible payment methods are used for transactions involving deposits.

Reminders and Notifications
1. Email Confirmation: Send email confirmations when payments are received, keeping customers informed and providing documentation of their transactions.
2. Payment Reminders: Automatically send reminders about upcoming installment payments to help customers stay on track with their payment schedules.
3. Enable/Disable Notifications: Control whether email notifications and reminders are sent, allowing you to customize communication preferences.
4. Customizable Email Content: Configure email content, headings, and subjects as needed. DEPART supports multiple dynamic placeholder shortcodes for personalized communication.
5. Compatibility with Email Customizers: DEPART is compatible with email customizer plugins, enabling you to design email templates to match your brand and style.
6. Various dynamic placeholders supported: This helps you edit your email content flexibly.

DEPART – Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce is designed to simplify your workflow with deposit and partial payment. It not only has easy setup and customization, but also comes with reliable customer support to help you with any questions or issues. Our dedicated team is here to ensure that you get the most out of the plugin and provide assistance whenever needed.

DEPART – Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce is not just about offering payment flexibility; it’s about providing a comprehensive solution that enhances your store’s functionality and customer experience. By integrating seamlessly with WooCommerce and popular payment gateways like Stripe, DEPART ensures that your customers have a smooth and convenient checkout experience. Whether you’re dealing with high-value products or looking to increase your overall sales, DEPART is the ultimate tool to achieve your business goals.

Boost your WooCommerce store’s functionality and customer satisfaction with DEPART – Deposit and Part Payment for WooCommerce today.

sections.installation:
1. Unzip the download package
  2. Upload depart-deposit-and-part-payment-for-woo to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
